title: Weep No More, My Lady / Stillwatch / A Cry in the Night
description: The "New York Times" called her a "master of horror," and her harrowing, best-selling stories are chilling proof. First time together in a collection sure to shock, three national bestsellers: Weep No More My Lady, A Cry in the Night, and Stillwatch. Even the price is thrilling
author: Mary Higgins Clark
